website_summaries.verdict: A flip flop that even flip flop haters can love.
pros: Soft fabric with a pliable thong and adjustable hook-and-loop closure that’s comfortable all day

customer_reviews.title: Outraged!  received shoes that were not only worn, but worn out!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually try them on because, believe it or not, they had already been worn and from the looks of it for a whole season. I am outraged that I have to deal with this issue. Is Amazon asleep???!!! This is incredible to me, I just recieved them today and immediately took pictures so people can see why I am so outraged.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Baldauff

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is so comfortable the moment you put it on. I was able to wear it all day with no problem. I took off s star because it's not available in half sizes. This is a 6, and as you can see, a 5.5 would be perfect. If it helps, my foot measures 8.75 inches long. Still, I would buy again as they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: F.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of Clark's and I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable sandals / flip flops. I wear flip flops about 6 months out of the year. These are the best ones I have ever gotten. My first pair of "mom" shoes 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cora

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I've started purchasing Clarks shoes recently at the recommendation of my chiropractor. I love them! I have a pair of leather boots that I wore for the first time last fall...12 hours! No blisters or sore feet. So I bought these sandals. I love them! Very comfortable. So much better than the rubber flip-flops I once wore. I love that they adjust across the top of the foot with Velcro. They look nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahAnn

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold = cute and classy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size I always wear and the fit is perfect! Very comfy for walking/ standing on my feet all day. I got
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing flip flops I have ever owned. I loved the rose gold so much I purchased in silver as well. Arch support is nice. I wear a 7.5 or 8. Since there was no 7.5 available I went with an 8 and it they fit just right. My heel has some room to spare in the back which is how I like my flip flops to be. The velcro buckle makes it easy to tighten to your preferred amount in the front. Much nicer to wear out in public than plastic flip flops too!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great for those with aching feet. You can withstand a flip flop longer with this brand than any other. Trust me, I'm a shoe freak. I've worn these flip flops most of the summer, while all my other brands just stay in the closet. BUT: If you spend a lot of time outdoors and they get wet, the design starts peeling off under your foot. It doesn't bother me, but in my opinion, Clarks doesn't need to go to the trouble and expense to put the design where your foot sits. It's unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9-1/2 Medium. Since these didn't come in 1/2 sizes, I ordered the 9. Fit is fine. I can't really say these are really Clarks Cloudsteppers, however. I took my foot out of a cloudstepper to try these on & there is no comparison in the cushioning. these don't have that much cushioning....as compared to other Cloudsteppers that I own. I think I may return. Rose gold color is pretty, however.
customer_reviews.author: WJS

customer_reviews.title: Broken (:
customer_reviews.text: Broken after 2 days of use, not sure why, but a great fit, and very comfortable shoes, wish quality different or maybe got a bad pair?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes/sandals I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes/sandals I've ever owned. Better than Teva, and much better than Vionic, which pushed my back into a very uncomfortable posture. The arch support is perfect, and the entire sole is soft, but not mushy under foot. I typically wear a 9 Wide to accommodate bunions, hammertoes and arch support issues, but that often leaves the shoe somewhat long, and in the case of sandals, floppy. As many reviews suggested, I sized down to an 8 medium, and it fits perfectly. I am very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Sandal (NOT SO FAST - UPDATE)
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and are so comfortable! Update: I've had these since May and I've worn them off and on during the Summer and today (three months after I purchased them) the adjustable sandal strap just broke. It's too late to return them, so I'm a pretty disappointed customer. I thought Clark's shoes were higher quality and would last longer than three months.
customer_reviews.author: Swans Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as Regular Clarks
customer_reviews.text: I've had Clarks Breeze Sea flips flops before and LOVED them! They lasted forever and were super comfortable. These? Not the same. The box says "Cloudsteppers by Clarks." I don't know if this is similar to an outlet line or what, but they aren't the same. Far less cushiony comfort. Are they comfortable? Yes, but not nearly as comfortable as others. I wish I would have paid full price for the real thing. I suppose you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: D. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly extraordinaire!
customer_reviews.text: So much more than I expected! Adjustable so I don't have to worry about losing them, more comfortable than any flip flop I've ever had, and cute enough to wear anywhere. These are my new favorites! You won't believe it until you try them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is rose gold size 6. Beautiful color and fits perfectly. These are the most comfortable flip flops I’ve ever worn. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect from Clarks shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these shoes, and they were very comfortable. However, after wearing them on just 4 occasions, the sole separated from the rest of the shoe!!!! Not at all what I expected from Clarks shoes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable excellent arch support
customer_reviews.text: Every foot has its shoe, and every shoe has its foot. My feet and Clarks found each other 30 years ago. We're a perfect fit and have remained together since. I've deviated and been unfaithful, trying other brands that end up being returned. I still have my first 2 pairs of leather wedgies, and my 4 flip flops and ordered the 5th. I plan o collect every color except pink and lavender. It's unbelievable a show or sandal will last 20 and 30 years intact, but these do.
customer_reviews.author: digtheisland

customer_reviews.title: Run narrow
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better than to order this brand as they run narrow. At one point I thought they had the "Wide" option clicked on. But guess I was mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: LITTLE SUPPORT and BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by the lack of support. They're certainly not orthopedic. They feel sloppy while walking. There is some kind of bouncy, spongy material in the sole. I bought them because of the flood of rave reviews. Now, it seems suspect to see this many reviews in such a short time. BTW Beware because this company does not pay return postage. For real support, my cheaper, New Balance PureAlign thongs are superb.
customer_reviews.author: jharles

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flop hands down
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these flip flops for many years now and have at least 10 pairs. I only buy the sea breeze ones. The other ones are not as comfortable somehow. I wear these all day walking, working, gardening etc etc and never have any problem with feet or back. These are soft to walk on and also do not hurt between your toes. Would highly recommend these and hope they never stop making them. Wash easily and dry quickly if get wet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! They are so comfortable. I usually wear size 8.5-9, I bought 9 and they fit great! They color is so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in Feb. I wear them as slippers around the house, never outside. I noticed black flecks on my white tile floor and at first thought the a/c needed cleaning. After having the a/c cleaned and new filter, etc. Still more black flecks. Used an old pair of thongs and lo and behold, no more black flecks. The soles of these were disintegrating onto my floors. Just so you are warned.
customer_reviews.author: yve

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I want these in every color but unfortunately I’m not independently wealthy. I normally wear an 8 1/2 but I usually size down to an 8 when buying flip flops/sandals/etc. I purchased a size 8 in these because the velcro allows you to widen or narrow the shoe (I have wide feet, so that was the main reason for choosing this particular style). It did take a few days to get used to them because no flip flop has ever been so comfortable!! I find them to be a bit pricey, but once you see the quality and feel the comfort, you’ll understand that the price is justified. Now after writing my review, I really want the red ones. 😆☺️
customer_reviews.author: S. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE FLIP FLOPS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE FLIP FLOPS! I have Clarks boots and always thought they were one of the most comfortable pairs of boots I've owned. Fit like a love and cushion the feet from walking/standing all day. When I say they made flip flops I used the try before you buy feature and wasted no time buying them. They are soooo comfortable. We have tile and hardwood floors and if I'm not wearing good shoes, the pads of my feet and ankles hurt by the end of the day. These are like walking on pillows without being bulky (just good soles) and the feet my feet like a glove. Just ordered me another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wagaman

customer_reviews.title: A nice sandal I just wish they would make sandals that ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice sandal I just wish they would make sandals that didn't have things on the foot bed that irritated sensitive feet (designs, nubs, etc). I loved these but the "d" ring that holds the strap in place broke today so I ended up stapling it together until I got home. Still trying to contact the seller. They are only 5 months old :-(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Heath

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Clark's Breeze Sea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs of these from different sellers to try the fit. This one came as a Clark's Breeze Sea "Cloudsteppers" which looks exactly like the Breeze Sea but is a much cheaper version with a terrible, stiff sole. The other pair I got looked exactly the same but was a normal Breeze Sea with a great foot bed and softer sole. I am guessing I received a Knock Off . There was no distinction on Amazon but the same shoe was very different.
customer_reviews.author: AmyC

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have plantar fasciitis and need to wear supportive shoes. These are very comfortable and I especially love that you can adjust the Velcro at the top of your foot if you need them to be wider. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: These sandals smell bad after wear
customer_reviews.text: I have never had an open footed sandal smell like these sandals do after wearing them for a day. I think that there is something about the foam foot pad that needs modification. I was wearing them all of the time for outdoor lounging but I will be looking for another sandal for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these flip flops!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had quite a few of these super comfy and cute sandals over the years. Lately it seemed impossible to find them on shoe websites. So I was thrilled to find them here. They arrived quickly and with minimal but enough protective packaging. They are sooo attractive - make my feet look pretty! And they fit my moderately narrow feet so well. I can walk for hours in these and they feel like.. HOME! Likely I will get another one soon too, as I like having a pair for around the house and one for "going out." I can not recommend these comfortable and stylish, cushiony sandals enough! They are true to size and great in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Marva

customer_reviews.title: A possible fix for plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: My feet love these sandals! I'd gotten plantar fasciitis in both feet from running in bad shoes and had pain all across the bottoms of my feet for months. Have tried Superfeet and all the usual suggestions. After three weeks of wearing these Cloudsteppers - and only these - my feet are much, much better. I'm able to walk on hard surfaces for hours on and off, and for the most part forget I have foot problems (until I have to wear full shoes again). Thank you Clark's!! (Now can you please make them somewhere besides China?)
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Broke after wearing around the house for 20 minutes. Poor arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these flip flops. When I first put them on, after walking around for a little while, my arches started to hurt, as they do when shoes don't offer arch support. It also seemed to fit a little weird. After just walking around my house in the for about a half hour, the top part near where you can adjust the size broke. So I returned them. I did not exchange them for another pair as I needed something with better arch support. They were cute, and I was very disappointed that something of this brand broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Worn Clarks but always shoes for work. I am retired and don't wear adult shoes unless forced. Wore out my daily flip-flops in the last year wearing them daily even in winter. Saw these sandals. More adult than my Crocs or beach flip flops. Great price and quick shipping. Been wearing them for the last few weeks and love them. Only issue is not as forgiving getting wet. Not rubber. I live in Portland OR where is wet 300+ days so this may reduce their wear. But worth it. Ordering a pair for my Mom who won't wear rubber shoes like OOFOS or Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Scaz

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive enough
customer_reviews.text: This sandal was not supportive enough for me. I have plantar fasciitis, and need all the support I can get in the arch area. I saw all the good reviews on this sandal and though I would try them. The first thing I noticed is that the toe strap hurt. There was no arch support, which won't do at all for my feet. Probably younger women (I'm in my 60s) can wear these just fine, if they have no feet issues.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bauser

customer_reviews.title: Received Wrong Style But My Daughter Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: These get 3 stars instead of 5 because I received the Clarks Brinkley Jazz flip flops in Greystone color, instead of the Breeze Sea flip flops in white. However, my daughter saw the Jazz's and loved them. So, serendipity for HER and I'm a happy mother. I did try these on and they fit well - I ordered down (usually wear a 71/2; ordered 8 originally and had to send them back - WAY too big - so ordered 7 this time) My daughter likes the color and especially the adjustable straps, which these also have. Her feet swell in the summer heat and these will remain comfortable. This is the same reason I wanted the Breeze Sea style.
customer_reviews.author: Child of God

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shoe
customer_reviews.text: So I just purchased these and all in all they are great. The foot bed is very soft and comfortable but firm enough to offer a bit of support. What I didn't care for is how small/short the adjustment band is. I do have somewhat tall arches but I had to adjust this so far out that it almost didn't make it the Velcro base. Secondly, due to it being so tight it rubbed across the top of my foot a bit. So, if you have really flat or low rising feet these might be perfect for you. They're also very classy looking for a pair of thongs.
customer_reviews.author: syvchick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe in every way. *****
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 7 but most shoes Are not wide enough for me so I usually have to buy a size 7 1/2. These shoes are absolutely perfect and beautiful I highly recommend. Most shoes that I buy online there’s usually something just not right with them, but the shoes are absolutely the best. You are not wide enough for me so I usually have to buy a size 7 1/2. These shoes are absolutely perfect and beautiful I highly recommend. Most shoes that I buy online there’s usually something just not right with them, but these shoes are absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Clark’s - foam footbed with thin molded sole
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a flip flop along the lines of a orthoheel (but pretty!), preferably in wide widths and good arch support (I’ve broken my foot and ankle twice. Unfortunately this Breeze product has a foam footbed and a molded sole. Don’t get me wrong, they’re comfy and cute but won’t let someone with bad feet walk for any appreciable distance - and not (IMHO) worth $33. I’m keeping them to use as pool shoes as my 10+ year old Orthaheels separated from the sole July 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E. Brugh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the shoe. I wear a half size and since they don't come in half sizes I ordered the next whole size shoe and they aren't too long. I have narrow feet and am pleased I can tighten the straps some with the velcro. I have a neuroma in my foot and have difficulty walking on hard surfaces and chose these because they appeared cushiony. These shoes are very cushioned and I am able to wear them all day. I'll be ordering more colors soon. My granddaughter told me they don't look like old lady shoes so I can keep them. You have to love the honesty of children.
customer_reviews.author: B. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Not actually that good at arch support
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in part because I saw reviews or question answer mention it had good arch support. Under the arch is actually the thinnest, weakest part of the sole, where it comes off the ground between the ball and the heel. The sole isn't quite rigid enough to provide any support in this area, and in fact, I can feel where the sole hits the floor at the end of the ball and start of the heel as slight lumps under my foot. Besides this, they are fairly comfortable and easy to adjust for a custom fit. I don't dislike them. I just wish they had better arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not very trendy
customer_reviews.text: Positive: the flip flops were amazingly comfortable. I felt like I was walking on clouds. I didn't care for the style. I'm in my 30s and felt that they weren't as fashion forward as I hoped. (Disclaimer: I got the silver with the white bottoms so perhaps a darker color would have looked better.) I have narrow to average width feet and I felt like they kind of looked like clown flip flops even though they were the correct size. I'd definitely recommend them for someone that is looking for an incredibly comfortable/ orthotic type flip flop, but maybe a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, my new “go to “ sandals
customer_reviews.text: If you live in Florida, you must own several pairs of sandals. I am no exception. This is my favorite pair. Comfortable ,sturdy great for walking . Must have for the beach. I usually wear a 10, ordered a 9 when I bought these. They fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Erzulie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for beach usage
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking and pretty comfortable. I had already ordered a few different colors and find them fun and convenient for everyday errands. The only problem I found out recently is they don’t work well for beach usage. The sole of the sandal has very narrow grooves that sand gets caught in. I understand needing traction but not practical for wearing on certain outdoor surfaces. Very difficult to clean. Can’t just dust/scrape of or quickly wash. Pretty much need a tooth brush or instrument to clean. I just don’t use them for the beach anymore and rely on a smoother sole flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Clarks finally got it right .
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are so comfortable for old, tired feet. And now, Clarks has made the size to correctly fit. I used to have to buy a larger size up because they didn't have half sizes in what I wanted. Therefore, they were sometimes too loose across the top of the foot. These fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Love Clarks Sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of similar sandals and I love them. Very comfortable and they wear well. This price was lower than what I could find in a local store, plus have never seen this color in a store.
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Love these!! Great support ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love ❤️ these flip flops!! I’m a nurse and when I’m not at work I’m usually wearing flip flops if weather permits. They have very good support for walking or standing for long periods of time. I read in the reviews that some people found them to be narrow, I did not find them to be narrow. My feet are wide and they fit great. I usually wear an 8.5, the 8 fits like a glove. I will be purchasing another pair for myself and a pair for my mom. I know she’ll love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: They took me by surprise! Amazing flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about these Clark's flip flops, that they have support and help painful feet and ankles.... I have had problems with my ankles since I was young and can hardly handle wearing socks and shoes in the house during the summer, so decided to give these a try, I was a little skeptical at first, but boy was I taken by surprise!! They do help my feet, I wear them around the house and to go out all the time and they are AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Look smart.  Feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually an 8 1/2 in a shoe and most of them tell you to size up then they’re too big on me I went with the reviewer‘s that said that the eight fit them perfect so I bought a pair and they are great comfortable and I just can’t say enough about them they’re not too high at the heel because then I have pain in my knees I would buy these again Clarks is a wonderful name I think this is my first pair of Clarks shoes
customer_reviews.author: Dian Burris

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfact flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops. Like walking on a cloud. I picked up the first pair at TJ Max. They only had the last one in my size 8. I knew I would have to have some extra pairs, they are that wonderful. Was lucky to find them on Amazon. I ordered two pairs. Only difference between TJ's is that half thickness of the sole is white and the Amazon ones are all black sole. The white combo adds a little more dressy look, but for comfort they are perfect and exactly the same. So glad I was able to find these here at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: happy to shop at Amazon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flip flops period...everyone needs a pair!
customer_reviews.text: If you wear flip flops, do yourself a favor and just get these. In multiple colors. I have several pain. They fit well, they are sturdy, they provide support without being clunky. I had a hip replacement last summer and I wore these shoes exclusively while I was walking, doing physicial therapy, etc. The footbed is cushioned nicely but with support. The strap is adjustable for wider feet or if you have any swelling. I can't think of a single thing negative about these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SV Brighter Days

customer_reviews.title: Little bit long but oh so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were a tiny bit too long but it wasn’t too bad so I decided to keep them. A 10 1/2 would probably be perfect but wasn’t an option. I like the soft pink color. The first day I wore them all day and they were very comfortable. Not always true of new shoes. I am considering buying a second pair in silver.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to find a suitable slipper to relieve my plantar fasciitis so I needed something I could wear in the kitchen until I do. These are so comfortable and help with the pain. I will never buy any other flip flops and will order another color for sure. Clarks for the win! For reference - I wear a 7M usually unless reviews say that a shoe runs narrow and then I order a wide. These were true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: How they look & feel.
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel wonderful! I recently learned that I have to begin wearing arch supporting "flip flops" and since the $10/pr brands are no longer an option, my neighbor recommended these. I'm so glad that she did. I ordered the same style, in 3 different colors. They say that if you wear a half size to go to the next closest size. I don't recommend that, as I did it for all 3 pairs, and ended up sending 1 pr. back and going down to the next size and they fit perfectly. I guess it depends on your foot. They are most comfortable flip-flops that I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: AuntPat

customer_reviews.title: Good support sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are best for arch support. I always have pain on my heels but wearing these sandals helps a lot. They provide good support and I can walk all day without any pain or discomfort. Very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Gunjan

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks shoes. I bought a different style of their sandal last year and I live in California, so I'm in them all year round and they just now started to wear down a little so I decided to get a new pair. I love the look of this sandal, and you can't beat Clarks for comfort. My only ding is that one shoe is slightly looser than the other and even though there is a velcro adjustment, it only adjusts so far, so my left shoe is a little looser than my right. So, I wish they were able to adjust even more, then they would be perfect and I would happily give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sullivan Marcus

customer_reviews.title: after using only a couple of months are falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I hardly wore this pair of sandals they are now starting to fall apart, I'm not sure what to do at this point seeing it's past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: suev

customer_reviews.title: BUY! This sandal!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a sandal that you can walk in all day long if you’re traveling or just a day out and about this is the sandal you want to buy. Over a six-month period of time I bought several sandals, all different brands but this is absolutely the most comfortable and supportive sandal I have found. I am a person of size and the cushion has not broke down and I wear them almost every day. No rubbing, no blisters and it’s adjustable for the top of your foot but the way it’s made there’s no rubbing on the inside of the top of your foot which makes all the difference in the world! Look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Miller

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and comfy! Finally a good flip flop for the beach and boats! I really feel sturdy on this one. Love the color and design.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota 💋

customer_reviews.title: Very well cushioned
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My only (small) complaint is that the strap (right foot) has a prick - like there was a tag attached and the plastic is still in there somewhere. I think the culprit is the outside material is attached closer to the sole than the inside and it's rougher. I'm hoping I can soften that spot somehow. BUT the sole is SO CUSHY! The purple strap and light gray sole are just so pretty! I feel I need more of these in different colors ;) Also.. the fit is perfect for a medium width foot. The arch is a little behind where mine is but they are cushy enough it isn't noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: 79stek

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable & Cute Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gold version of these flip flops in a shoe store & found the silver ones here. While part of me thinks of them as glorified flip flops ... something I could get a whole lot cheaper at a discount chain, another part of me recognizes that I'm paying for the cute design & major comfort. I really don't know how they could make a more comfortable flip flop, so all in all they are worth the price. I was buying them to wear with sundresses so I wanted them to be a bit more detailed in look than regular 'old flip flops & these fit the bill for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: A change for the worse and I won't be going back to Clark's anymore
customer_reviews.text: What the hell happened at Clark's? I have bought several pairs of these sandals over the years as they were so comfy and cute. I have buying/wearing these for well over a decade but this will be my last pair as every time I wear them I get navy blue residue all over the bottom of my feet. I look like I walked barefoot through an alley and then put sandals on. And this stuff doesn't wash right off. I have to scrub and scrub! I saw another woman in my office wearing a pair in black. She has the same problem as me. Also, like me, she never experienced this problem until she bought this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: The Everyday Sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these sandals in white because I wear them nearly every day in summertime until they are worn out (I have a few other colors as well but don’t use them as often). They are very comfortable and strike a good balance between sport and everyday wear so they perfectly pair well with most of my summer outfits but I can also walk all day in them, indoors and out. They have nice detail and fit just right to offer good support with no slipping. As long as they keep making these, I will keep buying them because they offer great all around value.
customer_reviews.author: harken

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes but....
customer_reviews.text: I've had these flip flops for about a year now and came back to search the reviews for odor or smell. Turns out I'm not the only one who has had to toss the shoes because they smell SOOO bad. I've never had foot odor before and thought I had a water leak somewhere in the floor of my closet due to the mildewy/ musty smell coming from the floor. Turns out it was these flip flops. They permeate whatever room they're in and after buying several shoe sprays, with limited success, finally I decided to just throw them away. Very disappointed as they were really comfy but I couldn't deal with the smell any longer.
customer_reviews.author: ciaobella33181

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable,  good for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em! Three weeks of wearing these helped my plantar fasciitis so much I bought a second pair. The arch is not too high for low-ish arches. They're soft but supportive. Sizing was perfect for size 9 feet. Winter, please go away soon so I can wear these outside again!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Foot clouds
customer_reviews.text: Clark’s are just amazing. These just could use a little better arch support. I have plantar fasciitis, and even when it gets healed, if I don’t wear arch support it quickly starts up again. Had it not been for this one issue, I would have kept them for sure, they are really pretty too. If you don’t have this problem, I’m sure you’ll love them. Like foot clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Clarks are the best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have these sandals in every color they make, and I live in them in the summer time! They are well made, and so comfy and cute. I would recommend them to any woman looking for a well priced and well made flip flop. Clarks are the best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Velcro straps kept coming undone
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my trip to Southeast Asia and they were super comfortable. I wore them everywhere...until I got to the beach. The Velcro straps kept coming undone whenever I walked on a surface that wasn't perfectly flat. Like, I had to walk over large flat stones on a walkway to get to the zip lining perch and when I walked on the packed wet sand at the beach. It was really annoying. But other than that, liked the look of them and, like I said, they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline on Crack

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I live in FL so I live in flip flops. This is my second pair of these. They are replacing a previous pair that I wore EVERY DAY for 3 years. I cant tolerate being barefoot in the house on the hard tile floors so this sandal gave me great cushion and arch support. I literally wore the others out to the point of being threadbare and know that these will last through our crazy hot summer's pavement as well as the protect my feet. I'd give 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Buschle

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! I have hip problems so shoes are important! I also can't stand regular shoes (athletic or everyday) and I never wear them. Sandals are my everyday shoes even in the midwest winters. I only wear boots when there is more than an inch of snow on the ground and that's only from car to building destination and back to car. Once inside boots are off and sandals are back on. They are great for everyday wear or office wear. These are my 3rd pair and I'm still wearing the 1st pair. Great quality, durability and longevity! Will definitely order more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Coolestmomuknow

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law has multiple pairs of Clark's and recommended them to me. What I love the most is that I didn't have to spend time breaking them in. From the moment they went on my feet, they were already comfortable and fitted enough to wear for the day! I usually wear a Size 8 shoe (sometimes a 7 1/2) and I wish I'd gone a 7 1/2 on these since I think they might have fit just my heel a little bit better. The 8 still fits fine though. They are very cute and I'm thinking of buying another pair in a different color already.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Denning

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive given the style
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair of flip flops for walking to/from the beach and around the beach town. We walk a lot here at the beach. Although there are plenty of thin flip flops for sale, I wanted something really comfortable to walk in, that provided some support. I love Clarks' shoes. So I bought these online, sight unseen. I love them. Very comfortable. I like the adjustable velcro straps on the top, allowing you to really fit them to your feet. They stay on. And the soles are heaven. Style is nice, too. I'm constantly hosing these sandals off with water after returning from the beach. They're holding up great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and cute flip flop.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these flip flops because so many people love them and I wanted a rose gold pair to add to my rotation...I’m so glad I did! They are cushioned, yet supportive. They adjust so well over your instep. The color is neutral and lovely. There was no break in time at all because they were so comfy. I bought an 8, and it was true to size. I’m so glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: FegelyTwinMommy

customer_reviews.title: Tight across the instep
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a previous pair that I loved and wore constantly during warm weather months for several years until our young dog chewed them up a month ago. I liked these flip flops because they can be washed and the sole is comfortable enough they can be worn for hours. Comparing this new pair to the previous, the strap across the instep is a tad snug and leaves a red mark on my foot. Maybe it will stretch as I wear them more. Also, while the sole seems the same in size and material, the fabrication of the straps seems a little bit cheaper than the previous pair that I purchased at a Clarks outlet store.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fashionable and I really like that the strap adjusts for wider, more fuller feet. The tongue between the toes is a bit wide, but I don’t wear them for too long so it hasn’t really been an issue. I have these in several colors. Wanted to use the amazon wardrobe so I could make sure the size was good, but it took over a month after ordering before they even thought about shipping them, so think way ahead. Now I will just order the same style in a different color and hopefully it will only take three weeks to come instead of five or six!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wore them all day long on day one!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I can’t stand flip flops or any sandal with the piece that goes between my toes but I wanted something that I could just slip on and show off my toes so I bit the bullet and ordered them...and these did the trick! Second, I love Clark style so I hoped these would be comfortable for all day wear at the park and beach when vacationing. They didn’t disappoint there either! Wore them right out of the box and was so happy...no blisters. And finally, I wear a 9.5 ladies and have wide feet so I was also concerned they’d be too narrow. Not an issue! Couldn’t have fit better and if there are more colors, I’ll buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these Clark’s flip flops! I have every sort of foot problem... my feet are too flat and too wide. And usually shoes with arch support just feel like I have a painful rock in each shoe. But the arch support in these shoes feels gentle and supportive. The more I wear them, the happier my feet are. All that, and they look good, too! (By the way, the silver ones look great with blue jeans.)
customer_reviews.author: Raincolors

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes but they are sour!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get some nice sandals and opted for these Clark’s ones. Hands down the most comfortable flip flops I have. But they Have a huge downfall they make my feet smell sour! And it’s not me because my other shoes don’t make my feet smell. It’s awful. I am so self conscious anytime I wear the shoes around people. They started smelling after a couple days of wearing. I did not wear them in water. So if you don’t mind being comfortable but smelling like a jar of vinegar then go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Owright

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the most comfortable flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised so many people love these. For me, these are not comfortable enough to wear all day long. I usually buy reefs and and wear them morning to night without any issues: they were my pregnancy shoes. These flip flops hurt if I try to do that. By night time, my feet ache badly. I wish I hadn't spent the money on these and just bought more of the quilted reefs instead. Two stars for the style, though. I got the nude color and the shiny part above the foot is really cute. Will continue to wear out during the day but switch back once I'm home.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam44

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing differences between shoes
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved these had they fit correctly. The straps are slightly different lengths making one shoe too tight (not enough Velcro to hold after adjusting) while there other for well. I measured the circumference of my feet, and they are the same. I measured the straps of each shoe, and there was a 1/4 inch difference between the right and left shoe in one place and a smaller difference in another place. Before sending them back, I offered them to my daughter, who has a different foot shape, and they were on for her.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely not for persons with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow not for wide feet. I wear a 12 W and the velcro strap kept coming unstuck as soon as I walked in them. I cannot wear them
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: May be comfortable if they fit right...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these online, and was ready to buy three pairs of them. Then I tried them through Amazon Prime Wardrobe, and discovered my foot was almost sideways in them. It was hitting the plastic hard piece on the side and they were super uncomfortable. This is probably just my feet, I would imagine, so I'd still say try them for yourself. I was bummed because I usually LOVE Clarks. Oh well, I found a replacement pair with a pretty flower (still Clarks) and they have wonderful support, so I will continue to shop for Clarks. :o)
customer_reviews.author: GamsGal

customer_reviews.title: I've worn this style for several years
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops. They're comfortable, have a bit of an arch support and have never hurt between my toes. They are worth the money. I wear them around home and even to go to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: lls

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were very comfortable. But, I have wide feet, and even though there is a Velcro closing, they did not work for my wide feet. I had to return them. It is very difficult, or almost impossible to find flip flops if you have a wide foot. A tip I received from New Balance, the rep suggested I try a men's size 7 (I normally wear an 8 1/2 wide). It would give me the width and the length.
customer_reviews.author: Erma J. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Redesign no longer fits narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Mailed this back. Even though it looked like the ones I have had in the past it did not fit the same. I have very narrow feet and have always been able to pull the strap tight to fit across the top of my foot. This shoe wasn't even close to fitting that way. Obviously they redesigned this in the past year and it doesn't make me very happy. I love the Clark's flip flops as they are the most comfortable shoe every. But I guess I won't be buying them now.
customer_reviews.author: woggie

customer_reviews.title: Not True to Size
customer_reviews.text: When I buy these exact same sandals in the department store I wear a size 10. When I order them from Amazon the size 10 is too long and too wide. However about a year ago I ordered a pair in Black Patent in a 10 and they fit perfectly. Since then the other pairs I have ordered I have had to return. I can't understand why? I would much rather order from Amazon than to go out to the store especially when I know the size and I do Not deviate from the brand design. I would like to know how this happens? I love these shoes, they are about all I can wear on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Paulamcv

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have worn a pair of these as my “go to” casual shoe for several years now. Sole is very cushiony and thong between toes does not rub or cause discomfort. These don’t need breaking in; comfortable from day one. Only concern is that the sole is not a true grippy one suitable for boating, and the footbed will become so slick you will slide off the sandal when it’s wet, so be careful if you wear these in the rain or at the pool. I bought this pair as backup for the pair I have been wearing for years.
customer_reviews.author: cchildre

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but no arch support
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very comfortable. There is a tiny bump in the arch area; what you see in the photo is what you get. People who asks about arch support are asking because they need it. The slightly raised area in the arch of the sandal is not high enough to give arch support. I’ve been wearing these for 1 month and I can already feel my plantar’s fasciitis starting up. Because I consider CLARKS to be a good brand name, I expect more from them. Had they raised the arch support and increased the ridges/grip on the sole of the sandal, I would have given this sandal a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Aprille

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 in most shoes, but since these only came in full sizes I ordered these originally in an 8 and had to return them for a 7. They are a well made, high quality shoe which is probably why I was able to size down to a 7. The surprise was the strap across the top of your foot has a Velcro strip which allows you to adjust the width!! I must have missed that in the description. Bonus! They are very comfortable and nicely cushioned. I now have these in the white and the navy. These will be my go to shoes this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lady

customer_reviews.title: Quality first in line then of course looks makes it all worth wild purchasing them.
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these Clark sea breeze flip flops & they were great.But the last 2pairs I ordered are just not quite the same any more. Don’t feel or look the same, needless to say I’m not drilled about them anymore. Unless Clark goes back to the original quality & design I will no longer order any more of them.
customer_reviews.author: sonja mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These wear like a dream. These allow me to adjust for what I don't have much of an arch , while supporting what I do have , wide feet. Looking forward to dressing them up or going casual. they're the right choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McLean

customer_reviews.title: Defective sandals
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in late July, 2019 and worn only a few times. My ankle kept turning in and the sandals were uncomfortable and unsafe to wear. I realized that the bottoms of the sandals, when compared to each other, were horribly defective. The right sandal sole is much higher on the outer portion of the sandal than on the inner portion. Must have been factory rejects, would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: empress1951

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, nothing to brag about.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of OluKai flip flops for about 10 years that I loved but sadly finally reached the end of their life. I bought these as a replacement and was underwhelmed to say the least. The soles are ok, but the arc support could be much better. The thong strap across the top is pretty uncomfortable. It comes up a little too high and is a little too snug. Fortunately there is velcro so you can adjust it. It should be a super comfortable shoe, but for some reason it’s just okay at best. Not the worst flip flop I’ve ever owned, but definitely not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Laina

customer_reviews.title: Sandals shrank in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I LOVED these sandals. I have plantar fasciitis and these sandals are a life saver. What I did not expect is that they shrink if left in direct sunlight for any period of time. I put these on the swim deck of my boat for a few hours (2.5hr). When I returned, my sandals were curled and shrank 1 size! The swim deck where the sandals were laid was in direct sun, but the surface was not so hot that you couldn't walk or stand on it. Also, the sandals were not on a surface that would intensify the heat, they were on the carpet. Was not expecting outdoor sandals to heat intolerant when left outside!
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I already have these flip-flops in navy blue and love them, so I decided I better get another pair in black. They were in perfect condition in their own shoe box inside the Amazon box. They also had spacers attached to the toe hold to keep the straps from going flat. They fit perfectly and are just as comfortable as my other pair. I can do serious walking in these! I would like to get them in some of the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStarGirl

customer_reviews.title: Clark's flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I have about 4 pairs in different colors, but always Clark brand, and I like them very much. They are comfortable and I can wear them all day. If you have severe foot problems, you may or may not like them, but they are much better than the flat bottom, uncomfortable shoes we see a lot (usually imported from China or ??). People do not have feet that are all the same, so a flat, hard molded shoe or flip flop isn't comfortable, in my opinion. Clark seems to do much better in the comfort department.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Not the original Clark sandals....
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of Clark sandals that are a size 8....and I love them. They are my favorite sandals. This pair of sandals that I ordered were a size 8 and way too big!! They were not comfortable and had absolutely no arch support. I DO NOT BELIEVE THESE WERE THE ORIGINAL CLARK SANDALS and I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Pedicures and Schlepping around the house in
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in size 7 (even though I'm normally a size 7 1/2) in black and use them as slipper around the house here in Arizona during the summer. Now I'm getting the navy color. I can wear out on short jounts but can't wear for long period as I have flat feet and my heel don't stay even on the shoe but go off to the side and eventually cause my hips and back to ache. For the price and because I love Clarks and flip flops, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: RobynAZ

customer_reviews.title: sine these only come in whole sizes, I'd recommend buying the size down from your reg size
customer_reviews.text: writing a review as I read them and they help. these candles are great. I have worn Clarks before and can say, that even though I have come up in size from a 6 to a 6.5 in shoes, these fit great in a 6. had ordered another pr that said they ran sm, so I ordered a 7, and had to send them back. these have a nice arch with a nice feel on the footbed. they look great on and can wear them with most anything. have had Clarks before, but bought others, but glad I went back to Clarks again.
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: These Clarks are great !
customer_reviews.text: these are the most comfy and supportive flip-flop I have ever owned! Last year I bought a pair in black to take on a tropical holiday, and they held up for over a year. with the way I walk, I am very hard on my shoes, so these flip flops were well worn, but the stitching and material portions of the sandal were great. I recently ordered them in taupe and have had these for a week. LOVE them! You get what you pay for... although they are flip flops, they are QUALITY! I would buy them in every color if I could!
customer_reviews.author: WVSharonanna

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I've made lately
customer_reviews.text: I have buyer's remorse a lot so it's great when something arrives that knocks my socks off. I could not be any more impressed with a pair of flip flops. They were fantastic right out of the box, went straight to the beach and survived a fair amount of abuse, road work, sand, salt water, even walking a couple of miles. They don't slip or slide and are unbelievably comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE ROSE GOLD COLOR
customer_reviews.text: I love this flip flop and own several pairs in various colors. The Rose Gold is my favorite. The straps are adjustable and the foot bed is very comfortable. I only wish they came in half sizes. I wear a 9 or 9.5. The 9 was a little short while the 10 is a tad too long but I had to take the 10 so my heel was on the foot bed. Love this flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flip flops! I have been wearing them for about 10 years, I'm 66. I own at least 6 pairs in all colors. They are so very comfortable! They aren't dressy but for my casual life style these are perfect. They have just enough support and a super comfortable sole, you can easily wear them all day long. I usually wear an 8 1/2 and I buy these in an 8. I love that you can adjust the strap, I have a narrow foot and usually need to pull the velcro strap to it's most snug position. I highly recommend these for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CB

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Breeze Sea Flip-Flop
product_meta.description:
Carefree, casual, and comfortable. this sporty women's flip-flop is soft and lightweight in synthetic uppers, with a fabric thong and fun printed footbed. effortless summer style for a day at the beach, by the pool, or on the boat.

Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
